chunked_vad.lyrics_text: It's all on me, it's my mistake I said "I don't love you" a little too late But I guess there ain't ever a right time And I don't know why it's called a goodbye
I said "I don't love you" a little too late But I guess there ain't ever a right time And I don't know why it's called a goodbye Go run my name into the ground
But I guess there ain't ever a right time And I don't know why it's called a goodbye Go run my name into the ground Tell everyone you know just how
And I don't know why it's called a goodbye Go run my name into the ground Tell everyone you know just how How I slammed the door on our forever
Go run my name into the ground Tell everyone you know just how How I slammed the door on our forever But I promise you it's for the better
Tell everyone you know just how How I slammed the door on our forever But I promise you it's for the better I hope you find what you were looking for
How I slammed the door on our forever But I promise you it's for the better I hope you find what you were looking for I hope your heart ain't hurting anymore
But I promise you it's for the better I hope you find what you were looking for I hope your heart ain't hurting anymore And you get moving on, all figured out
I hope you find what you were looking for I hope your heart ain't hurting anymore And you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow
I hope your heart ain't hurting anymore And you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow 'Cause I hope you're happy now
And you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow 'Cause I hope you're happy now Who knew this heart could break this hard
And you don't hate me somehow 'Cause I hope you're happy now Who knew this heart could break this hard Or a love like ours could fall apart
'Cause I hope you're happy now Who knew this heart could break this hard Or a love like ours could fall apart Without so much as a warning?
Who knew this heart could break this hard Or a love like ours could fall apart Without so much as a warning? I thought that I was what you wanted
Or a love like ours could fall apart Without so much as a warning? I thought that I was what you wanted Well, I guess you found what you were looking for
Without so much as a warning? I thought that I was what you wanted Well, I guess you found what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore
I thought that I was what you wanted Well, I guess you found what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore I'm a wreck, I'm a mess
Well, I guess you found what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left
I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left And so I hope you're happy now
I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left And so I hope you're happy now I hope you find what you were looking for
And I ain't got nothing left And so I hope you're happy now I hope you find what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore
And so I hope you're happy now I hope you find what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore Hope you get moving on, all figured out
I hope you find what you were looking for I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore Hope you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow
I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore Hope you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow I'm a wreck, I'm a mess
Hope you get moving on, all figured out And you don't hate me somehow I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left
And you don't hate me somehow I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left So I hope you're happy now
I'm a wreck, I'm a mess And I ain't got nothing left So I hope you're happy now Happy now
And I ain't got nothing left So I hope you're happy now Happy now Oh, I hope you're happy now
